isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - SINGLE REDUCTION, SINGLE SPEED AXLES: SPICER D135-S, F155-S, F170-S SERIES - LUBRICATION - SUBMERSION OR DEEP WATER FORDING

svcproc.title: SUBMERSION OR DEEP WATER FORDING
svcproc.para: In the event the gear carrier housing should become submerged in water, particularly if over the vent, it is recommended that the lubricant be drained and internal parts inspected for water damage and/or contamination prior to assembling the carrier to the housing and refilling with the specified lubricant.
